posts.postText:
For those of you who dont know, all our lives end 11.11.11, because of the release of Skyrim .
Fun facts: November 11th is also a Friday, and Veterans day. For those of you who have school, Veterans day is normally no school.

In other news, I just started to look up  lots  of videos on it.
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjqsYzBrP-M
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ic6dKnv3WdU 

Please post awesome and amazing videos (of Skyrim, ofcourse) I  need  to see moar!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5xwboyafbwc&feature=relmfu

Go there and it starts the 3 part Demo that was created(You'll find the other parts at the top of the list to the right).
